mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT r.REPORT_BOARD_ID AS reportBoardId, r.TITLE AS title, r.CONTENT AS content, r.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, r.EMAIL AS email, u.NICKNAME AS nickname, ( SELECT i.IMAGE FROM REPORT_BOARD_IMAGE i WHERE i.REPORT_BOARD_ID = r.REPORT_BOARD_ID ORDER BY i.REPORT_BOARD_IMAGE_ID ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS thumbnail FROM REPORT_BOARD r JOIN USER_INFO u ON r.EMAIL = u.EMAIL ORDER BY r.CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT r.REPORT_BOARD_ID AS reportBoardId, r.TITLE AS title, r.CONTENT AS content, r.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, r.EMAIL AS email FROM REPORT_BOARD r WHERE REPORT_BOARD_ID = #{reportBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT_BOARD SET TITLE = IF(#{title} IS NOT NULL, #{title}, TITLE), CONTENT = IF(#{content} IS NOT NULL, #{content}, CONTENT) WHERE REPORT_BOARD_ID = #{reportBoardId}
